named-query.name: implicitInner
named-query.query: select b from Bid b where b.item.name like 'Fo%'

named-query.name: multipleImplicitInner
named-query.query: select b from Bid b where b.item.seller.username = 'johndoe'

named-query.name: multipleImplicitInnerAnd
named-query.query: select b from Bid b where b.item.seller.username = 'johndoe' and b.item.buyNowPrice is not null

named-query.name: explicitInner
named-query.query: select i from Item i join i.bids b where b.amount > 100

named-query.name: explicitOuter
named-query.query: select i, b from Item i left join i.bids b on b.amount > 100

named-query.name: explicitOuterRight
named-query.query: select b, i from Bid b right outer join b.item i where b is null or b.amount > 100

named-query.name: outerFetchCollection
named-query.query: select i from Item i left join fetch i.bids

named-query.name: outerFetchCollectionDistinct
named-query.query: select distinct i from Item i left join fetch i.bids

named-query.name: outerFetchMultiple
named-query.query: select distinct i from Item i left join fetch i.bids b join fetch b.bidder left join fetch i.seller

named-query.name: badProductFetch
named-query.query: select distinct i from Item i left join fetch i.bids left join fetch i.images

named-query.name: thetaStyle
named-query.query: select u, log from User u, LogRecord log where u.username = log.username

named-query.name: thetaEqualsId
named-query.query: select i, b from Item i, Bid b where b.item = i and i.seller = b.bidder

named-query.name: implicitEqualsId
named-query.query: select i, u from Item i, User u where i.seller = u and u.username like 'j%'

named-query.name: explicitEqualsId
named-query.query: select i, u from Item i, User u where i.seller.id = u.id and u.username like 'j%'

named-query.name: parameterEqualsEntity
named-query.query: select i from Item i where i.seller = :seller

named-query.name: parameterEqualsId
named-query.query: select i from Item i where i.seller.id = :sellerId

named-query.name: nojoinEqualsId
named-query.query: select b from Bid b where b.item.id = :itemId

named-native-query.name: outerFetchMultipleSQL
named-native-query.query: select i.name as ITEM_NAME, b.amount as BID_AMOUNT, u1.username as BIDDER_USERNAME, u2.username as SELLER_USERNAME from Item i left outer join Bid b on i.id=b.item_id inner join users u1 on b.bidder_id=u1.id left outer join users u2 on i.seller_id=u2.id;
